attr.title: Beyond a Total Loss
attr.desc: A Dark and Comedic adventure that combines gameplay elements from Lisa and Resident Evil. You play as John Harry after he drives his car off the edge of a cliff. He's now stranded in an old podunk town filled with weirdos. Help John escape the town and best a series of strange ordeals. Thank You Pseudobug for creating this amazing adventure!
attr.inst:
1) Open the Steam Console
2) Open Download.txt
3) Copy the text from Download.txt into the Steam Console and press ENTER
4) Patiently wait for the game to Download
5) Open Game Location (You can Copy and Paste the file location from the Steam Console after the game is successfully downloaded)
6) Copy and Paste files into the gamedata folder
7) Enjoy the Game!
